InfoReplace.Description:
Fast Travel Disabled
Disables fast travel in the game.
Changes made by this mod: [list] [*] Fast travel to any location is physically impossible. [/list]
Other Information: [list] [*] This mod may be co-op friendly. I haven't run any tests yet. [/list]
Credits: [list] [*] [size=1][color=lightgreen]Author: [/color][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/users/32262030][b]LinkHero95[/b][/url][/size] [/list]
